data.text: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia deraghvɨra gan. Ia gumazamiziba gansɨ osamɨva, arazir aghuibar amuan markɨ. Ia kamagh damu, uan Afeziar uan Nguibamɨn itim da ivezir aghuitam inighan kogham.

“Egh ia bizitam isɨ gumazir asaghasazitam danɨngsɨva, tav amadaghtɨma a mangɨ ian arazir aghuir kamɨn, gun mɨkɨman markɨ, egh mati gumazir maba me God ko mɨgeir dɨpeniba ko tuavibar tuiva odava ami mokɨn. Ia men mɨn damuan markɨ. Kamagh amir darasi, me gumazamizibar damazibar uan araziba akakaghtɨma, me men ziaba fasa. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me uan ivezim inigha gɨfa.
Ia asaghasazitamɨn akurvaghsɨ, ian agharir guvim arazir kam damutɨ, agharir kɨriam arazir kam gɨfoghan kogham.
6:4 Matyu 6:6; 6:18Eghtɨ ian akurvazir arazir kam averara ikɨtɨ, ian Afeziar bizir mogomebar garim, ian arazir aghuim ikaragham.”

Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia God ko mɨkɨmsɨ, gumazir ifavariba ami moghɨn damuan markɨ. Me God ko mɨgeir dɨpeniba ko tuavir ekiabar akabar tuiva, God ko mɨkɨmasa bar akonge. Me odava, egha ghaze, gumazamizir avɨriba nan ganigh nan ziam fam. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me uan ivezim inigha gɨfa.

6:6 2 Atriviba 4:33; Matyu 6:4; 6:18Eghtɨ ia God ko mɨkɨmsɨ, uan dɨpenir averiamɨn mangɨ tiam asaragh, egh modogh ia uan Afeziam ko mɨkɨm. Kamaghɨn, ian Afeziar bizir mogomebar garim, a ian ivezim ia danɨngam.
“Ia God ko mɨkɨmsɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kɨnir avɨribar amuva, God gɨfozir puvatɨzir darazi ami moghɨn damuan markɨ. Me ghaze, me mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨribar amuam, eghtɨ kamaghɨn God me baragham.
6:8 Matyu 6:32Me ami moghɨn, ia damuan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, ia puvatɨzir biziba, ia da bagh tɨghar uan Afeziamɨn azangsɨghamim dughiamɨn, an adagh fogha gɨfa.
“Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia kamaghɨn God ko mɨkɨm:
Eghtɨ Dughiar Nɨ Bizibagh Ativamim,
E datɨrɨghɨn damamin dagheba,
Egh me e gamir arazir kuraba e da gɨn amadi moghɨn,
Egh e ateghtɨ,
“Guizbangɨra, ia gumazamiziba ia gamir arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨtɨ, ian Afeziar uan Nguibamɨn itim, ian arazir kuraba gɨn amangam.
6:15 Matyu 18:35; Jems 2:13Ia men arazir kuraba gɨn amangan koghtɨ, ian Afeziam uaghan ian arazir kuraba gɨn amangan kogham.”

Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia dagheba ataghɨrazir dughiamɨn ia gumazir ifavaribar mɨn uan guabagh ekuan markɨ. Gumazir ifavariba dagheba ataghɨrazir dughiamɨn, gumaziba men ganasa, me uan guaba ruer puvatɨgha pughpurighav arui. Me odava arazir kabagh ami. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me uan ivezim inigha gɨfa.
Eghtɨ ia dagheba ataghɨrazir dughiamɨn, ia borem uari aghɨva uan guaba ru,

6:18 Matyu 6:4-6eghtɨ gumazamiziba ia dagheba ataghɨrazir arazir kam gɨfoghan kogham. Eghtɨ ian Afeziar danganir mogomemɨn itim, anarɨra ian ganigh fogham. Egh gɨn ian Afeziar bizir mogomebar garim, a ian ivezim ia danɨngam.”

Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia nguazimɨn ikia uari bagh bizir aghuiba akumakum dar pozibav kɨnam markɨ. Nguazir kamɨn, barereba ko omebaba dar amɨtɨ, da mazɨva akughɨregham. Eghtɨ okɨmakɨar gumaziba bɨriba akar da okɨmam.

6:20 Matyu 19:21; Luk 12:33-34; 18:22; Kolosi 3:1-2; 1 Timoti 6:19; 1 Pita 1:4Ia Godɨn Nguibamɨn uari bagh bizir aghuiba pozibav kɨn. Godɨn Nguibamɨn barereba ko omebaba bizibar aman koghtɨ, da mazigh, akughɨran kogham. Eghtɨ okɨmakɨar gumazitam bɨritam akarigh da okemeghan kogham.
6:21 Luk 12:34Nɨn bizir aghuiba itir danganim, nɨn navir averiamɨn itir ifongiam, a uaghan danganir kamra ikiam.”
Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Damaziba, da lamɨn mɨn namnamɨn angazangarimɨn mɨn iti. Damazim derazɨ, nɨn namnam angazangarim bar a gizɨvaghtɨ, nɨ arazir aghuibar amuam.
Eghtɨ nɨn damaziba ikuvigham, nɨn namnam bar mɨtarmeghtɨma, nɨ arazir kurabar amuam. Eghtɨ nɨn angazangarim mɨtarmegham, mɨtarmer kam bar pɨrigham.”

Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ingangarir gumazitam o amizitam, gumazir ekiar pumuning bagh ingaran kogham. A tavɨn aghuagh, tav gifuegham. O, a tav baghvɨra ikɨ, tav akɨrim a gasaragham. Ia God ko dagɨaba bagh uaghara ingaran markɨ.”

Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ia mɨgei, ia pamten uan ikɨrɨmɨrim gɨnɨghnɨghɨva, kamaghɨn azangan markɨ, e dagher manatamra damam, o e dɨpar manatamra damam? Egh ia pamten uan inivafɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ, e inir manatam uan mɨkarziba avam? Gumazimɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim ti daghebagh afira, ezɨ gumazimɨn mɨkarzim ti inibagh afira.

6:26 Jop 38:41; Onger Akaba 147:9; Matyu 10:29-31; Luk 12:6-7; 12:24Ia kuarazibar gari, da dagheba oparir puvatɨgha da pozibagh aghua da isa dagher dɨpenibar amadir puvatɨ. Ian Afeziar uan Nguibamɨn itim, dagheba dagh anɨdi. Ezɨ ian ikɨrɨmɨrim ti kuarazibar ikɨrɨmɨrim gafirazir puvatɨ?
Egh ian tav deraghvɨra ikɨsɨ nɨghnigh kamaghɨn a ti uan ikɨrɨmɨrim damutɨ a tong ruaragham? Bar puvatɨ.
“Ia tizimsua, pamten korotiabagh nɨghnɨsi? Ia akɨmarir aghuaribagh nɨghnɨgh. Da manmaghɨn otifi? Da ingangarir ekiatam gamir puvatɨ. Egha da korotiatam isamizir puvatɨ.
6:29 1 Atriviba 10:4-7; 2 Eghaghaniba 9:3-6Ezɨ kɨ ia mɨgei, fomɨra Atrivim Solomon bizir bar avɨriba ikia an azuir adiariba bar dera, egha an korotiatam akɨmarir kabar mɨn otozir puvatɨ.

E fo, graziba pura biziba, da iti, gurumɨn gumazitam dar akoreghɨva da isɨva avitam mɨkɨnigham. Grazir kɨnir kabanagh God adiariba me gazui. Ia bizir kam gɨfogh, God uaghan adiariba ia danɨngam. Ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavir muziarim itiba!
Kamaghɨn, ia pamten nɨghnɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ, ‘E dagher manatam ramegham? O, dɨpar manatam amam? O, e inir manatam ikegham?’
6:32 Matyu 6:8Gumazir God gɨfozir puvatɨziba pamten bizir kabagh nɨghnɨsi. Ezɨ ian Afeziar uan Nguibamɨn itim fo, ia bizir puvatɨzir kaba, ia da iniam.

6:33 1 Atriviba 3:13-14; Onger Akaba 37:4; 37:25; Rom 14:17Ezɨ bizir ia bar faragh damuamimra kara: Ia God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam baghvɨra nɨghnɨgh, egh God ifongezir arazir aghuibar amutɨ, a bizir kaba ko maba sara bar ia danɨngam.

“Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia pamten gurumzaraghan bagh dɨghorim isiva nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Gurum izamin dughiam, a mar uan bizibara nɨghnɨgh. Dughiar manamɨn otivir osɨmtɨziba, da anarɨra ikɨ. Aruer manamɨn otivamin biziba, mar an biziba.”
